infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your photos to let you choose a profile picture
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Allow $(PRODUCT_NAME) to access your camera to take profile pictures

plugins.photosPermission: The app needs access to your photos to set your profile picture.
plugins.cameraPermission: The app needs access to your camera to take profile pictures.
